wait for another copy unless ur desperate

Well I've seen it in 3D yesterday, and it had a great story. I don't know why haters complained there? It was really great.

The visuals = outstanding. Not one other movie come close. Number one!

Don't see the flat version without the details. The surround sound at the theater was very dynamic and all channels is used to perfection. 

If you really can't go to the movies, wait for BD at least.

This copy is seriously the worst in the world. If you have to download Avatar, do not download this version. It looks like a copy, of a copy, of a copy, of a copy. I give the video a 3. Piece of giant doo doo. Not worth your time.
